content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('usp_UpdateDimLCVoucher', 'P') IS NOT NULL
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_UpdateDimLCVoucher]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[usp_UpdateDimLCVoucher] 
AS

UPDATE dim
SET
  dim.EffToDate = updt.EffToDate,
  dim.IsCurrent = updt.IsCurrent
  --dim.ProcessDate = GETDATE()
--SELECT *
FROM Dim.LCVoucher dim
INNER JOIN 
(
  SELECT
    ID,
    DENSE_RANK()  OVER(PARTITION BY VoucherCode ORDER BY EffFromDate) EventID,
    LEAD(EffFromDate) OVER(PARTITION BY VoucherCode ORDER BY EffFromDate) EffToDate,
    GETDATE() AS ProcessDate,
    CASE 
      WHEN (LEAD(EffFromdate) OVER(PARTITION BY VoucherCode,VoucherState ORDER BY EffFromDate)) IS NULL THEN 1
      ELSE 0
      END AS IsCurrent,
    LoyaltyCardID
  FROM Dim.LCVoucher
) updt
ON updt.ID = dim.ID
/*Uncomment after the first run and add WHERE clause to update the records with current Fingerprint
WHERE
  ISNULL(dim.EffFromDate, GETDATE()) <> ISNULL(updt.EffFromDate, GETDATE()) OR
  ISNULL(dim.EffToDate, GETDATE()) <> ISNULL(updt.EffToDate, GETDATE()) OR
  dim.IsCurrent <> updt.IsCurrent
*/
